com.whirlycott.cache
Class CacheManager

java.lang.Object
  com.whirlycott.cache.CacheManager

public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object

The CacheManager manages caches by creating and deleting them.

Author:
Phil Jacob

public void shutdown()
              throws CacheException
Shuts down the manager of all of the Caches, which in turn shuts down all of the Caches.

CacheException - When the Cache cannot be shutdown properly.
